answers.answer: I have pcos and this is my second pregnancy my first is two and a half and I'm 39+3 and everything is going fine. They will test you for gestational diabetes as it's policy for expectant mums to be tested other than that you should be fine x
Polycystic ovarian syndrome. It's basically lots of cysts on your ovaries x

Thankyou for the reassurance lucie I will be booking in the drs today but was very worried as iv been trying to catch pregnant since my first daughter was born 3 years ago but that's made my feel loads better so thankyou very much x

question: Hi I have pcos and on Christmas Eve I found out I was pregnant I took a clear blue it said 2-3weeks I'm also having a few pulling pains in what feels like my whom on both sides I was just woundering if my baby is safe with pcos ? Or should I be worried this is my second pregnancy by the way but as far as I no I didn't have pcos the first time but I did have a up and down pregnancy .
title: I have pcos and I'm pregnant
